com.app.controller

Class CharacterEditorItemsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.app.controller.CharacterEditorItemsController

  • public class CharacterEditorItemsController
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class holds all the logic for actions available on the Character Inventory Menu.
    Author:
    Ali Afzal

      • CharacterEditorItemsController

        public CharacterEditorItemsController(java.util.ArrayList<com.app.models.CharacterModel> characterLists,
                              int objIndex,
                              java.lang.String plyrType,
                              com.app.menus.CharacterEditorMainMenu mainMenu)
        This Constructor holds all the action listeners for Item Inventory Menu
        Parameters:
        characterLists - ArrayList of all characters in the file and their properties
        objIndex - index in the ArrayList which holds the character properties
        plyrType - Type of the character
        mainMenu - CharacterEditorMainMenu object to manipulate GUI elements
